name: Septic Savages
description:
Thanks to the power of HTML5 and Construct 2 you can try a demo of Septic Savages right now in your browser! Please see the above announcements to give the game a whirl and decide whether or nor it's for you.Game Features
  • 4,320 different powerup combinations!
  • 27 possible difficulty settings, from simple fun to insane brutality!
  • 2 modes of play: an 8 level campaign and endless arcade mode!
  • Play alone or with a friend! Local co-op support for both modes of play.
  • Complete controller support!
  • Bosses, potions, enemies, biomes, random environments, catchy tunes, and more!
